message.content:
cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.NE 

The paper deals with the problem of cyber-attack detection in the smart grid, which is a subfield of computer security (cs.CR). The proposed solution involves using reinforcement learning (RL) to solve a partially observable Markov decision process (POMDP) problem, which falls under the categories of artificial intelligence (cs.AI), machine learning (cs.LG), and control systems (cs.SY). Additionally, the use of RL implies the use of neural networks, which is a subfield of computational neuroscience (cs.NE).
